name: Cellar
description: You are in a dark and damp cellar with a narrow passageway leading north, and a crawlway to the south. To the west is the bottom of a steep metal ramp which is unclimbable. The trapdoor above you is closed.

name: The Troll Room
description: This is a small room with passages to the east and south and a forbidding hole leading west. Bloodstains and deep scratches (perhaps made by straining fingers) parsing walls.
short_description: You are in the troll room.
